bug.author: JayeetaP
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
77.0.3865.90 - Page only shows - 'Streamlit failed to hash an object of type <class 'code'>' <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Go to 'Choose a Demo' Click on 'DataFrame Demo'
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47.4 Python version: 3.7.3 Using Conda OS version:10.14.6 Browser version: Chrome 77.0.3865.90

comments.comment:
Getting the same error. <denchmark-code>python 3.7.4 streamlit 0.47.4 </denchmark-code>
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6121530/66552550-2ff11b80-eb67-11e9-89ea-b2c2258ae8af.png></denchmark-link>
This is the error text the pages shows at the end <denchmark-code>TypeError: object supporting the buffer API required File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/ScriptRunner.py", line 306, in _run_script exec(code, module.__dict__) File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/hello.py", line 334, in <module> run() File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/hello.py", line 308, in run demo() File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/hello.py", line 247, in data_frame_demo df = get_UN_data() File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/caching.py", line 544, in wrapped_func return get_or_set_cache() File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/caching.py", line 509, in get_or_set_cache code_hasher.update(func) File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/hashing.py", line 185, in update self._update(self.hasher, obj, context) File "/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/streamlit/hashing.py", line 217, in _update hasher.update(b) </denchmark-code>

Hi all! This looks like a dupe of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/242>#242</denchmark-link> . The fix is coming soon with PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/pull/254>#254</denchmark-link>
(Closing this as a duplicate. Please reopen if you think this is not right)
